_meanings:
{@--1@} To enter upon, set
forward, set foot in.

{@--5@} To behave or act towards, deal
with; {#kiM prapadyate vEdarBaH#} <ls>M. 1</ls> ‘what
does he propose to do’; {#paSyAmo mayi#}
{#kiM prapadyate#} <ls>Amaru. 20.</ls>

{@--7@} To draw near, come on, 
approach (as time &c.).

{@--8@} To be 
going on, to proceed.

{@--10@} To throw 
oneself down, fall down (at another's
feet).
